title: This fking sucks help
body:
This has happened to me 5 times now and it’s tilting me so hard I’ve waisted the last hour and a bit tryna figure this out but I’m from NZ btw don’t know if that matters and this wasn’t on ranked cuz I wasn’t in the mood

But basically what happened is that I was in champ select everything going fine then second before the game starts someone dodges then apparently it was me who dodged and I got a que block and it wasnt even me and couldn’t join a game so I tried again after 5 minutes same thing happened with 15min wait then I go on blind pick instead of draft and the same fkin thing happens 2 times with 15min waits then I relog and the same FKIN thing happens and now I’m tilted cuz I spent that long doing nothing.

ANYONE ELSE HAVING THIS PROBLEM

replies.body: Are you locking in your champion? Did someone in your premade dodge?
